special_text:
Whenever you get one or more {V} [i](research counters)[/i], put that may loyalty counters on Samara, Containment Proctor.
[+1]: Surveil 1.
[-3]: Choose target creature card in your graveyard or target creature on the battlefield. Return it to its owner’s hand. You get {V}.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature enters, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Shade in addition to its other colors and types.”
